name: remove ads on www.programmer-club.com
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("programmer-club.com") {
img[src$="award.gif"],
img[src="/images/2008new/club_1.jpg"],
td[height="31"],
a[target="_blank"]:not([href^="ShowSameTitleN"]):not([href^="ShowOneTextN"]),
a[href*="pc2020v5/conference"],
a[href*="ad.asp"],
td[background="/images/club_122.jpg"],
table tbody a img, div>table[width="96%"] tbody a,
td[width="263"], 
table tbody tr > td img[src^="/images/mem_icon/"],
object[width="160"][height="600"], img[width="180"][height="40"],
object[src*="pcshool"],
object,
TD[width="221"][rowspan="2"]
{ display: none !important ;}
}
